title: Problems with the launcher!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

replies.body: I'm getting reports that most players have been able to get logged in finally, as these patcher loop issues have finally been smoothed over. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still getting stuck in that loop so that we can look into your specific issue.
this is happening to me as well
